results.deck: Sony is publishing a video game in collaboration with EDM's own Avicii.
results.name: Vector

results.deck: MatterFall is a new game from Housemarque.
results.name: MatterFall

results.deck: Ride the rollercoaster as Until Dawn spawns a VR-exclusive follow-up.
results.name: Until Dawn: Rush of Blood

results.deck: Turn based strategy game Desert Ashes returns with an infusion of pygmies from Pocket God.
results.name: Pocket God vs Desert Ashes

results.deck: An expanded version of MX vs. ATV Supercross with new content and updated graphics and gameplay.
results.name: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore

results.deck: Paragon is a 3rd person MOBA developed by Epic games and was released in 2016
results.name: Paragon

results.deck: An arena combat game created by Studio HG, a one-man development studio.
results.name: Smashing the Battle

results.deck: A 4 player competitive brawler.
results.name: SkyScappers

results.deck: France reçoit sa propre édition de Let's Sing pour la Wii et la PlayStation 4. Bien!
results.name: Let's Sing: Hits Français 2016

results.deck: A mystery visual novel where an old letter leads the main character to start looking into the disappearance of a high school pen pal from 15 years ago.
results.name: Root Letter

results.deck: A tactical RPG based off Japanese folklore about three heroes that fight against the gods.
results.name: God Wars: Toki wo Koete

results.deck: EA Sports' Mixed Martial Arts sequel furthers their effort to make the definitive UFC simulation game.
results.name: EA Sports UFC 2

results.deck: A prequel to the Valkyria Chronicles franchise that follows the battles of a small country named Jutland attempting to gain freedom from the colonial rule of the Rus Empire.
results.name: Valkyria: Azure Revolution

results.deck: A puzzle game where the player must guide 3 lost animals back to their home.
results.name: Dreamals

results.deck: 2D platformer about Miko, who is on a hunt for diamonds in Evil Corp's mines.
results.name: Miko Mole

results.deck: The maker of Retro City Rampage is working on a new open-world, retro-tinged game.
results.name: Shakedown Hawaii

results.deck: The third and final chapter in the Utawarerumono series
results.name: Utawarerumono: Futari no Hakuoro

results.deck: The second episodic adventure game developed by Telltale Games set within the 'Song of Ice and Fire' universe.
results.name: Telltale's Game of Thrones: Season 2

results.deck: Tricky Towers is a multiplayer, physics-based, tower-building puzzle game.
results.name: Tricky Towers

results.deck: Space Dave! is a fixed shooter similar to Space Invaders. It is a spiritual successor to Woah Dave!
results.name: Space Dave!

results.deck: A Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game from PlatinumGames and Activision, based on IDW's comic book version of the mutants.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants in Manhattan

results.deck: Run through the grid in this runner set in the Tron universe.
results.name: TRON RUN/r

results.deck: Telltale Games brings their trademark adventure game style to the Caped Crusader.
results.name: Batman: A Telltale Games Series

results.deck: Originally an update to Primal Carnage (2012), Primal Carnage: Extinction is a class-based dinosaur vs. human online multiplayer shooter.
results.name: Primal Carnage: Extinction

results.deck: Bound is a 3D platformer being developed by Plastic, with deep narrative elements and heavily inspired by modern art.
results.name: Bound

results.deck: A new version of Rez is being produced for PlayStation VR.
results.name: Rez Infinite

results.deck: The next Ace Combat game will support PlayStation VR.
results.name: Ace Combat 7

results.deck: The sequel to Ni no Kuni being developed for the PlayStation 4.
results.name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom

results.deck: The second game from Roundabout developers No Goblin, 100ft Robot Golf is a golf game where you play as impossibly large robots on their quest for par. The game is set to launch simultaneously for PS4 and PlayStation VR in 2016.
results.name: 100ft Robot Golf

results.deck: Highwire Games is developing its first game exclusively for PlayStation VR.
results.name: Golem

results.deck: Fly like an eagle in this VR game for PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: Eagle Flight

results.deck: This VR-focused Psychonauts game bridges the gap between the first game and Psychonauts 2.
results.name: Psychonauts in the Rhombus of Ruin

results.deck: FarSight Studios has produced a PS4 and Xbox One bowling game with the Brunswick license.
results.name: Brunswick Pro Bowling

results.deck: Sony's long-running baseball franchise returns for the 2016 season.
results.name: MLB The Show 16

results.deck: A collection of the six original Bit.Trip games for the PS3, PS4, and Vita.
results.name: The BIT.TRIP

results.deck: A VR-based title were players learn what it is like "to job" in a world where all such tasks are now performed by robots.
results.name: Job Simulator: The 2050 Archives

results.deck: A PlayStation VR exclusive being developed by Vitei Backroom in collaboration with Sony Santa Monica were players take control of a zombie taxi driver
results.name: The Modern Zombie Taxi Co.

results.deck: A Nex Entertainment action game based on the the Japanese manga of the same name.
results.name: Killing Bites

results.deck: ASCII comes back to roguelikes in Brut@l from Stormcloud Games.
results.name: Brut@l

results.deck: In addition to the obligatory balance tweaks, this upgrade to Tekken 7 adds additional characters - including Akuma from the Street Fighter series.
results.name: Tekken 7: Fated Retribution

results.deck: A giant shadow attacks Ichi City where the player controls an average everyday person who must survive the monster's onslaught.
results.name: Project City Shrouded in Shadow

results.deck: A reboot of the canceled Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4 being developed for the PlayStation 4 by Granzella.
results.name: Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4 Plus: Summer Memories

results.deck: A new PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4 entry into the longrunning Sengoku Basara series which follows the life of Sanada Yukimura
results.name: Sengoku Basara: Sanada Yukimura-Den

results.deck: The latest entry in the longrunning series of Gundam strategy RPG's, SD Gundam G Generation Genesis is being developed to launch on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita in 2016 as part of Gundam's 30th Anniversary
results.name: SD Gundam G Generation Genesis

results.deck: Little Devil Inside is a crowdfunded 3D action adventure RPG game.
results.name: Little Devil Inside

results.deck: An indie horror game about a pizza man getting trapped in a house by a girl named Emily, and her possessed dolls.
results.name: Emily Wants to Play

results.deck: The third game in the Sydney Hunter series.
results.name: Sydney Hunter and the Curse of the Mayans

results.deck: An online multiplayer vehicular combat game.
results.name: Hardware: Rivals

results.deck: Snow Moto Racing Freedom is an arcade racer where you drive snowmobiles in open terrain and perform stunts. Online racing with world ranking is also available.
results.name: Snow Moto Racing Freedom

results.deck: This game from Snap Finger Click aims to take care of all the setup and score keeping for Charades, leaving the players free to focus on embarrassing themselves!
results.name: Act It Out! A Game of Charades

results.deck: A Fantasy Sports Game where two teams of two players control opposite ends of a worm-like being and wrestle for control of the game balls.
results.name: Push Me Pull You

results.deck: An adventure game about a group of friends that accidentally open a paranormal rift on an old military island.
results.name: Oxenfree

results.deck: A game about the youth Tarpak and his dog Taro.
results.name: Dogchild

results.deck: Furi is a fast paced combination of twin stick shooter, bullet hell and third person action game. The player is challenged in one-on-one arena boss fights designed by Takashi Okazaki, creator of Afro Samurai.
results.name: Furi

results.deck: A space-flight game using platforming and physics for the PS4.
results.name: Amazing Discoveries In Outer Space

results.deck: A satirical action-adventure game themed after a 1950s sci-fi movie.
results.name: The Deadly Tower of Monsters

results.deck: The long awaited successor to Tennis in the Face.
results.name: Baseball Riot

results.deck: Wondershot aims to bring back the fun and good times you had playing couch competitive and co-op with your family and friends.
results.name: Wondershot

results.deck:
101 Ways To Die is a physics-based puzzler with a twist.

It's not about Killing...
It's about Killing with style!
results.name: 101 Ways to Die

results.deck: Some of the creators of Burnout are working on a new golf game.
results.name: Dangerous Golf

results.deck: An updated version of Chaos Code featuring a number of balance tweaks.
results.name: Chaos Code: New Sign of Catastrophe

results.deck: Inspired by Irish folklore, Song of the Deep is a 2D, side-scrolling, underwater adventure game from Insomniac Games.
results.name: Song of the Deep

results.deck: Livelock is a cooperative top-down shooter from Tuque Games.
results.name: Livelock

results.deck: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens covers the seventh film and includes material that occurred between Return of the Jedi and Force Awakens.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens

results.deck: An alternate history RPG set in the early 20th century.
results.name: Black Rose Valkyrie

results.deck: The third in Tru Blu's series of rugby games.
results.name: Rugby Challenge 3

results.deck: A same-screen vehicular combat party game that supports up to 16 local players, inspired by Mashed and Micro Machines.
results.name: Obliteracers

results.deck: Trial by Viking is a single-player side-scrolling action adventure game from Last Life Games.
results.name: Trial by Viking

results.deck: A mystery game that adapts the classic Hercule Poirot detective novel.
results.name: Agatha Christie: The ABC Murders

results.deck: Platformer starring the cleanup robot MOP.
results.name: MOP: Operation Cleanup

results.deck: ArmaGallant: Decks of Destiny is a deck-building game for the PlayStation 4 from Rock Nano Global.
results.name: ArmaGallant: Decks of Destiny

results.deck: 2016's entry in the Call of Duty franchise will be developed by Infinity Ward.
results.name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare

results.deck: H1Z1: King of the Kill is a fast-paced shooter that uses Playerunknown's Battle Royale system in which players compete against eachother in a 100+ players battle. The objective is to be the last standing man.
results.name: H1Z1: King of the Kill

results.deck: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3 is a first person shooter that mainly focuses on sniping like its predecessors. It is more open world this time around with different ways of going about missions.
results.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3

results.deck: A puzzle-platformer in which players switch between characters to record movements, rewind and then combine them to advance.
results.name: Replay: VHS is Not Dead

results.deck: A sci-fi horror FPS set on a parallel Earth full of zombies.
results.name: Chasing Dead

results.deck: An "Original Generation" entry of the Super Robot Taisen series for PlayStation 3 and 4.
results.name: Super Robot Taisen OG: The Moon Dwellers

results.deck: This 1987 arcade game was tweaked and re-released on the Famicom as "Booby Kids."
results.name: Kid no Horehore Daisakusen

results.deck: Insurgency: Sandstorm developed by New World Interactive, is the predecessor to the successful source engine mod Insurgency. Despite its mod based past, Insurgency: Sandstorm is a standalone product.
results.name: Insurgency: Sandstorm

results.deck: Shadwen is a stealth-action game developed by Frozenbyte (creators of the Trine franchise).
results.name: Shadwen

results.deck: A narrative-driven, top-down infiltration game set in South America about investigating a cult.
results.name: The Church in the Darkness

results.deck: An adventure game from Vertigo Games.
results.name: Adam's Venture: Origins

results.deck: Join the Italian resistance and snipe the hell out of fascists in the latest Sniper Elite game.
results.name: Sniper Elite 4

results.name: RETSNOM

results.deck: Exploding Tuba Studios' first game is Divide.
results.name: Divide

results.deck: Pankapu: The Dreamkeeper
results.name: Pankapu: The Dreamkeeper

results.deck: Gundam Breaker 3, a sequel to Gundam Breaker 2 for PS3 has now moved on to the next generation of games on the PS4.
results.name: Gundam Breaker 3

results.deck: Indie physics puzzle game.
results.name: Dreii

results.deck: BigBen's not-Tetris puzzle game now continues being not Tetris on another generation of consoles.
results.name: Tetraminos

results.deck: Get rowdy with the Playroom robots in virtual reality with this free PlayStation VR release.
results.name: The Playroom VR

results.deck: A collection of VR experiences developed by Sony's London Studio.
results.name: PlayStation VR Worlds

results.deck: Supermassive's Tumble is getting a follow-up for PlayStation VR.
results.name: Tumble VR

results.deck: The Playroom is a collection of augmented reality games for PlayStation 4 that uses the PlayStation Camera.
results.name: The Playroom

results.deck: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island is a 3D platformer that draws inspiration from the 64-bit era of platforming games.
results.name: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island

results.deck: Death Squared is a cooperative puzzle game from SMG Studio.
results.name: Death Squared

results.deck: NeuroVoider is a futuristic twin-stick shooter RPG currently on Steam Early Access. It was developed by Flying Oak Games.
results.name: NeuroVoider

results.name: LastFight

results.deck: Racers:Dirt is a top-down rally cross game from 21C Ducks.
results.name: Racers:Dirt

results.deck: A sequel to the 2014 reboot of the Hayarigami horror visual novel franchise.
results.name: Shin Hayarigami 2
